title: Pheasant Breast Stuffed with Apples in a Cider Vinegar and Prune Sauce
ingredients: ['3 apples - peeled, cored and chopped', '4 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '100g (4 oz) dried breadcrumbs', '175ml (6 fl oz) chicken stock', '4 boneless, skinless pheasant breast fillets', '8 rashers streaky bacon', '1 onion, finely chopped', '175ml (6 fl oz) apple cider vinegar', '1 (500g) packet pitted prunes, chopped', '175ml (6 fl oz) double cream']
